objects.name: Script Execution
objects.description: The execution of a text file that contains code via the interpreter.

x_mitre_log_sources.name: m365:office
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: VBA auto_open, auto_close, or document_open events

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: osascript or AppleScript invocation modifying UI

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: AppleScript creating login item via 'System Events' dictionary

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:Application
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Stored procedure creation, modification, or xp_cmdshell invocation via SQL logs or SQL Server auditing

x_mitre_log_sources.name: ApplicationLogs:SQL
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Stored procedure creation or modification with shell invocation (e.g., system(), exec())

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:PowerShell
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Set-ADUser or Set-ADAuthenticationPolicy with MFA attributes disabled

x_mitre_log_sources.name: etw:Microsoft-Antimalware-Scan-Interface
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Amsi/Script content + API verdicts during in-memory staging

x_mitre_log_sources.name: WinEventLog:PowerShell
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Scripts with references to XML parsing, AES decryption, or gpprefdecrypt logic

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: exec: Unexpected execution of osascript or AppleScript targeting sensitive apps

x_mitre_log_sources.name: azure:activity
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/runCommand/action: Abnormal initiation of Azure RunCommand jobs or PowerShell/Bash payloads

x_mitre_log_sources.name: EDR:AMSI
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Malicious inline C#/script blobs embedded in MSBuild projects if intercepted by AMSI-aware loaders (rare but possible via chained LOLBins)

x_mitre_log_sources.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: osascript, AppleScript, or Python execution triggered immediately after HID connection
